title: 'comment<...>' fields do not make it into the search index
body:
#### What is the problem?

Most of the demographic info from BIDS datasets cannot be used for queries.

```
In [5]: da.metadata('/tmp/openfmri/ds000002/sub-05/anat/sub-05_T1w.nii.gz')
/tmp/openfmri/ds000002/sub-05/anat/sub-05_T1w.nii.gz (file): bids:age(years),bids:participant_id,comment<participant#sex>
Out[5]: 
[{'action': 'metadata',
  'dsid': u'd0e8cec2-7df4-11e6-8c5a-002590f97d84',
  'metadata': {'bids:age(years)': '24',
   'bids:participant_id': 'sub-05',
   'comment<participant#sex>': 'female'},
  'parentds': '/tmp/openfmri/ds000002',
  'path': u'/tmp/openfmri/ds000002/sub-05/anat/sub-05_T1w.nii.gz',
  'refcommit': u'beb66435e75f6b3baacd188c683dffb08eda70e8',
  'status': 'ok',
  'type': 'file'}]
```

same record as a search result:

```
{'action': 'search',
  'metadata': {u'bids:age(years)': u'24',
   u'bids:participant_id': u'sub-05',
   u'type': u'file'},
  'parentds': u'/tmp/openfmri/ds000002',
  'path': u'/tmp/openfmri/ds000002/sub-05/anat/sub-05_T1w.nii.gz',
  'query_matched': {u'type': u'file'},
  'refds': '/tmp/openfmri',
  'status': 'ok'},
```

One could argue that most of this info is anyhow so under-specified that it cannot be found anyways.

However, in #1625 we have code for heuristic-based discovery of information on gender and handedness. We might want to bring that over into the BIDS parser to produce properly annotated metadata.
